product_name: Trails and Treks of Missouri and Northern Arkansas
long_description: This guide contains detailed descriptions for over 100 trails of varying lengths located throughout Missouri and Northern Arkansas. Frey, Kelly and Baron, Steve. Softcover; 230 pages; 81 maps, 37 black-and-white photos. Show Me Outdoors; copyright 2000. Packed full of trails designed to enjoy for the day or explore over a weekend. Each trail outlined is written straight from experience with every mile having been covered via foot by the authors. Each trail description includes a map, driving directions, length, reasons for hiking the trail and detailed hiking instructions. Trails-at-a-glance chart at beginning of book helps you quickly find hikes that are right for you.
short_description: This guide contains detailed descriptions for over 100 trails of varying lengths located throughout Missouri and Northern Arkansas.
